subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The only thing standing between Cincinnati and an 8-0 start is a matchup against Cleveland on Thursday, but given the Browns’ tough start and rash of injuries, the team does not appear to present much of a challenge.
snippet: The only thing standing between Cincinnati and an 8-0 start is a matchup against Cleveland on Thursday, but given the Browns’ tough start and rash of injuries, the team does not appear to present much of a challenge.
